TopicTitle: I am thrilled, then happy, then pleased.

Articles.Content:
I got someone I know to buy KSP.

Finally, I've been into KSP for just under a year, and most of the people at my school seem to think this style of game is dull. The people who are closest to being considered my clique are all the minecraft players.

BUT I MANAGED TO GET SOMEONE PLAYING KSP!

Where is my medal?

I am so happy (to paraphrase Yahtzee) that my cheek muscles are going to latch around the top of my head like a miss Pacman bow.

Now I'm off to go and being happy a bit more.
